ISSUE.TITLE: Plugin Resource string is missing after install RC 4.30
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: RC 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Get RC 4.30 deployable code from here https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/81557/nopcommerce-430-rc-is-available-please-share-your-impressions 2) Install in local IIS All plugin resource string is not imported.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4653 Fixed problem with missing resource strings after plugin installation
